variant.p: The Board observed that management commentary meets the definition of ‘other financial reporting’ described in paragraph 7 of the Preface to International Financial Reporting Standards. Thus the Board decided that management commentary is within the boundaries of financial reporting and within the scope of the Conceptual Framework. Consequently, management commentary is also within the scope and authority of the Board.
